title: The Roost
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe, deli, and dessert bar opened in early 2011. Offers tempeh and tofu options for sandwiches; selections of vegan and gluten-free cookies, cakes, and pastries; smoothies and coffee with almond, rice, and soy milk for vegans. Substitutions for non-vegan ingredients are accommodated.
